Name: The Forgotten Isles
About the game: The Forgotten Isles is a fast-paced action platformer. Explore three scenic worlds, navigate your way past obstacles, complete levels as fast as possible, and discover the secret of The Forgotten Isles. Key Features - 3 Atmospheric and precarious worlds to explore and race across against the clock - 30 Unique levels to test your platforming skills - Complex mechanics that allow you to beat the level the way you choose - Ghost system allowing you to race yourself - A speed-running timer for you to race yourself - Fluid movement for complete character control - Xbox Controller Support CREDITS: Developer : Phantom Programming Music : Joshua Davidson Music Sound FX : Joshua Davidson Music, Phantom Programming
